content: this is a crochet pattern for a tiny mushroom 1 7 cm in height this little gem is perfect for dollhouse decor or even as earrings **materials needed ** * no 80 crochet thread in red ivory and green less than 3 yds each color **some suggestions ** anchor artiste mercer crochet no 80 dmc special dentelles #80 rico design spitzengarn susan s family morandi #80 if you can t find these threads they can be replaced by 12wt cotton quilting thread or use 2 strands of no 25 embroidery thread * steel crochet hook 0 5mm * tapestry needle scissors tweezers * fiberfill the pattern is not difficult but if you haven t crocheted with thread before please try to crochet with crochet thread size 3 or size 10 first so it s easier for you i hope you enjoy crocheting it as much as i did
